subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brian Dux was known for his assists. He finished his career at Canisius second on the program’s career list. Dux was a point guard for the Golden Griffins for four seasons, earning All-Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference honors in 2002 and 2003.
